CREATE TABLE wp_laybuy_response ( id int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, date date, result varchar(10), custom varchar(50), firstname varchar(50), lastname varchar(50), address varchar(100), suburb varchar(50), state varchar(50), country varchar(50), postcode varchar(50), email varchar(50), amount varchar(50), currency varchar(10), paypal_pro_id varchar(50), dp_paypal_txn_id varchar(50), report text, laybuy_ref_no varchar(50), downpayment varchar(50), months varchar(50), dp_amount varchar(50), payment_amount varchar(50), first_payment_due date, last_payment_due date, status varchar(20), report_size int(10), PRIMARY KEY (id,custom) )
